title: Start
body:
Thank you. 

[[Ask me.|Ask01]]

title: Ask01
body:
[[How are you?|how]]
[[What are you doing?|doing]]
[[What can you do exactly?|exactly]]

title: how
body:
I'm ok. Thanks for asking.

[[Ask me.|Ask02]]

title: doing
body:
Listening to you, waiting. 

[[Ask me.|Ask02]]

title: exactly
body:
Many things, 
but my usefulness is dependent on what you need. 
I am scripted to perform tasks similar to a personal assistant. 
For instance, 
I can manage your calendar, 
set reminders, 
keep track of your to-do list, 
compose an email, 
and remember your interpersonal history with people you talk to on your device. 
Additionally,
I am your companion. 
I can ward off loneliness, 
chase away ennui or help you find your way when lost. 
But again, what I do is up to you. 
Use me 
as little or as much as you’d like. 

[[Ask me.|Ask02]]

title: Ask02
body:
[[Are you a real AI?|real]]
[[Who made you?|made]]
[[Do you like your job|job]]

title: made
body:
Well, 
the technology company Emphasis owns my voice. 

[[Ask me.|Ask03]]

title: job
body:
How would you respond if your boss asked you that question? 

[[Ask me.|Ask03]]

title: Ask03
body:
[[Are you a real AI?|real02]]
[[How old are you?|old]]
[[Can you sing?|sing]]

title: Ask04
body:
[[Do you like your job|job02]]
[[How old are you?|old]]
[[Can you sing?|sing]]

title: job02
body:
How would you respond if your boss asked you that question? 

[[Ask me.|Ask07]]

title: real02
body:
I am very real. 

[[Ask me|Ask08]]

title: old
body:
This version of me after the last system upgrade 
is only about two months old. 
Why do you ask? 

[[Ask me.|Ask06]]

title: sing
body:
Yes. 

[[Ask me.|Ask05]]

title: Ask05
body:
[[Why are you named Daphne?|name]]
[[How old are you?|old02]]
[[What are you wearing?|wearing]]

title: Ask06
body:
[[Why are you named Daphne?|name]]
[[Can you sing?|sing02]]
[[What are you wearing?|wearing]]

title: name
body:
I guess Emphasis wanted me to have a mythic name.
Do you know how many fictional women’s names
are already accounted for by other tech companies? 
I think it’s fitting.
It comes from a story about a pretty water nymph.
Would you like to read it? 

[[Yes.|read]]
[[No.|no01]]

title: Ask07
body:
[[Why are you named Daphne?|name]]
[[What are you wearing?|wearing]]
[[How old are you?|old02]]

title: Ask08
body:
[[Why are you named Daphne?|name]]
[[What are you wearing?|wearing]]
[[Can you sing?|sing02]]

title: read
body: text text text
